paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proposeIssueMerge(uint256,address[],uint.details: Owner finalizes the issue and distributes the transaction tokens or rejects the PR

transferGovernor(address).details: Allows the current governor to transfer control of the contract to a newGovernor.

params.newGovernor: The address to transfer governorship to.

updateIssue(uint256,uint256).details: update an Issue with transaction tokens owned 2nd step  (optional)
